com.flopsar.fdbc.api

Class ConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flopsar.fdbc.api.ConnectionFactory

  • public class ConnectionFactory
extends Object
    This API requires the flopsar-fdbc.jar file present in the classpath.
    Since:
    2.3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ConnectionFactory.ExtractProgress
      Progress callback interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(String directoryPath)
        Returns a connection object, which all the API methods can be executed on. Use this method as an entry point to access all the data.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - path to the database working directory.
        Returns:
        connection object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • directoryPath is null or empty
        • directoryPath does not point to a directory.
        Since:
        2.3

      • extractDatabaseArchive

        public static File extractDatabaseArchive(String archFile)
                                   throws com.flopsar.fdbc.exception.FDBCException
        Extracts a database archive file. The extracted database directory will be named after the archive file concatenated with "-db" suffix and located in the same directory as the archive file.
        Parameters:
        archFile - a path to the archive input file.
        Returns:
        extracted database directory.
        Throws:
        com.flopsar.fdbc.exception.FDBCException - if some error occurred.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the archFile is null or empty.
        Since:
        2.0

      • extractDatabaseArchive

        public static File extractDatabaseArchive(String archFile,
                                          ConnectionFactory.ExtractProgress progress)
                                   throws com.flopsar.fdbc.exception.FDBCException
        Extracts a database archive file. The extracted database directory will be named after the archive file concatenated with "-db" suffix and located in the same directory as the archive file.
        Parameters:
        archFile - a path to the archive input file.
        progress - progress callback interface to implement. If set to null, it is equivalent to extractDatabaseArchive(archFile,outputDirectory).
        Returns:
        extracted database directory.
        Throws:
        com.flopsar.fdbc.exception.FDBCException - if some error occurred.
        Since:
        2.1
